root.name: Vroom
root.description: OverviewVroom is an F1 racing game developed and published by Lankhor for the Amiga, Atari ST, and PC platforms. The cockpit is seen on screen from first person perspective. Lot's of scenery to enjoy, like trees, flying ballons, bridges etc. Lot's of tracks with tight curves, steep grades and inclines. Mix of 2d and 3d graphics. Cars have rearview mirrors.
